TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalServiceSecuritySettings extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供可设置的本地服务安全属性。

span.span: Provides local service security properties that can be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含 用于生成安全通道的本地安全设置。This class contains the local security settings used by the to build the security channel. 这些设置是服务的本地设置，不以服务的安全策略来表示。These settings are local to the service and are not represented in the service's security policy. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类更改 设置。This example shows how to use the class to change the setting. summary.span: 获取或设置通道因处于不活动状态而关闭前等待的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the duration to wait before the channel is closed due to inactivity.

value.span: 一个 ，表示与客户端的安全会话因处于不活动状态而关闭前等待的时间。

span.span: A that represents the duration to wait before the security session with the client is closed due to inactivity.

value.span: 默认值为2分钟。

span.span: The default is 2 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，在安全对话会话中，绑定上的此属性和 `ReceiveTimeout` 属性将影响会话超时。In a secure conversation session, note that both this property and the `ReceiveTimeout` property on the binding affect session timeout. 两个属性中时间较短者将确定何时发生超时。The shorter of the two determines when timeouts occur. 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均适用：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有客户端凭据类型。All client credential types for and . - 如果已启用[ \ 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90))，则为。If [\ element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90)) is enabled. - 如果未启用[ \ 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90))，则在上 为 = `true` 或 = `true` 。If [\ element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90)) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均不适用：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 对于 。For . - 对于 。For . - 如果未启用[ \ 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90))，则在 带有 = `true` 或且没有 属性设置为时 `true` 。If [\ element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90)) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 `InactivityTimeout` 值。This example shows how get the `InactivityTimeout` value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置服务允许一次缓存的 的最大数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of s that the service allows to cache at once.

value.span: 服务可以缓存的安全对话 Cookie 的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of secure conversation cookies that can be cached by the service.

value.span: 达到此限制后，服务将移除缓存时间最久的安全对话 Cookie，为新安全对话 Cookie 腾出空间。

span.span: When this limit is reached the service removes the oldest cached secure conversation cookies to make room for new secure conversation cookies.

value.span: 默认值为 1000。

span.span: The default is 1000.

summary.span: 获取或设置通信双方的系统时钟之间允许的最大时间差异。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.

value.span: 一个 ，表示进行通信双方的系统时钟之间允许的最大时间差异。

span.span: A that represents the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.

value.span: 默认为 5 分钟。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 5 分钟。The default value for this property is 5 minutes. 未通过发送时间测试的消息会被拒绝。Messages that do not pass the send-time test are rejected. 此属性与消息时间戳验证和 属性一起使用。This property is used in conjunction with the message timestamp verification and the property. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 `MaxClockSkew` 值。This example shows how to get the `MaxClockSkew` value. summary.span: 获取或设置已与服务器建立的并发安全会话的最大数目，该服务器已经为这些会话颁发会话令牌但尚未为这些会话发送任何应用程序消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent security sessions that are established with the server for which it has issued a session token but for which no application messages are sent.

value.span: 最大并发安全会话数。

span.span: The maximum number of concurrent security sessions.

value.span: 默认值为 128。

span.span: The default is 128.

remarks.format: ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 `MaxPendingSessions` 值。This example shows how to get the `MaxPendingSessions` value. summary.span: 获取或设置服务可参与的与客户端的最大并发安全协商数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent security negotiations with clients that the service can participate in.

value.span: 服务可参与的与客户端的最大并发安全协商数。

span.span: The maximum number of concurrent security negotiations with clients that the service can participate in.

value.span: 默认值为 128。

span.span: The default is 128.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超过此限制的协商会话将被拒绝，并将 SOAP 错误发送回客户端。Negotiation sessions in excess of this limit are rejected and a SOAP fault is sent back to the client. 客户端通常只能稍后重试，这样，服务上的现有协商才能有时间完成。The client typically must retry later, which allows some time for existing negotiations on the service to complete. ## Examples 此示例演示如何设置 `MaxStatefulNegotiations` 值。This example shows how set the `MaxStatefulNegotiations` value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端与服务之间的安全协商阶段的最长持续时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum duration of the security negotiation phase between client and service.

value.span: 一个 ，表示客户端与服务之间的安全协商阶段的最长持续时间。

span.span: A that represents the maximum duration of the security negotiation phase between client and service.

value.span: 与服务的任何协商（例如消息级别 SPNego 或 SSL 身份验证期间）都必须在此时间内完成。

span.span: Any negotiation with the service (for example during message level SPNego or SSL authentication) must complete within this time.

value.span: 默认值为 1 分钟。

span.span: The default is 1 minute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超过此限制，将引发异常。If this limit is exceeded, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。This example shows how to get the value of this property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在传输失败后安全会话是否尝试重新连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures.

value.span: 如果在传输失败后安全会话尝试重新连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures; otherwise .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此标志设置为 `true`，则服务允许客户端通过多个传输连接发送对应于单个安全会话的消息。If this flag is set to `true`, the service allows the client to send messages that correspond to a single security session over multiple transport connections. 这在使用安全 WS-ReliableMessaging 的情况下很有用，因为客户端要求会话容忍瞬态传输故障。This is useful in the case of secure WS-ReliableMessaging because the client requires the session to tolerate transient transport failures. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。This example shows how to get the value of this property. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于重播检测的 Nonce 缓存大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the nonce cache used for replay detection.

value.span: 用于重播检测的 Nonce 缓存大小。

span.span: The size of the nonce cache used for replay detection.
The default is 900,000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nonce 是“只用一次的数字”。A nonce is a "number used once". 如果超过 Nonce 计数，则将拒绝传入的消息并引发 。If the nonce count is exceeded, the incoming message is rejected and a is thrown. 旧 Nonce 将被及时移除。Old nonces are removed in a timely manner. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。This example shows how to get the value of this property. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#11)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#11)]

summary.span: 获取或设置服务接受消息的最长时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time within which the service can accept a message.

value.span: 一个 ，表示服务接受消息的最长时间。

span.span: A that represents the maximum amount of time within which the service can accept a message.

value.span: 默认为 5 分钟。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nonce 是“只用一次的数字”。A nonce is a "number used once". 服务拒绝过去发送的超过 持续时间的所有消息。The service rejects all messages that are sent more than the duration in the past. 对于在 `ReplayWindow` 内到达的消息，将会检查其 Nonce 的唯一性。Messages that arrive within the `ReplayWindow` have their nonce checked for uniqueness. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。This example shows how to get the value of this property. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalServiceSecuritySettings#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalservicesecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#12)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在安全会话中使用的密钥的生存期。

span.span: Gets or sets the lifetime of a key used in a security session.

summary.span: 此时间间隔到期后，将自动续订密钥。

span.span: When this interval expires the key is automatically renewed.

value.span: 时间跨度，此时间之后服务要求发起方续订用于安全会话的密钥。

span.span: The time span after which the service requires that the initiator renew the key used for the security session.

value.span: 如果发起方在此时间内不续订密钥，则服务将向发起方发送回错误。

span.span: If the initiator does not renew the key within this time the service sends back a fault to the initiator.

value.span: 默认值为15小时。

span.span: The default is 15 hours.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均适用：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有客户端凭据类型。All client credential types for and . - 如果已启用[ \ 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90))，则为。If [\ element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90)) is enabled. - 如果未启用[ \ 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90))，则在上 为 = `true` 或 = `true` 。If [\ element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90)) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均不适用：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 对于 。For . - 对于 。For . - 如果未启用[ \ 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90))，则在 带有 = `true` 或且没有 属性设置为时 `true` 。If [\ element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90)) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。This example shows how get the value of this property. summary.span: 获取或设置密钥续订后的一个时间间隔，这段时间间隔内上一个会话密钥在密钥续订期间对传入的消息有效。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval after key renewal for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages during a key renewal.

value.span: 时间间隔，这段时间间隔内上一个会话密钥在密钥续订后对传入的消息有效。

span.span: The time interval after key renewal for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages after a key renewal.

value.span: 默认为 5 分钟。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥续订后，客户端和服务器应始终使用最新的可用密钥发送消息。After key renewal, the client and server should always send messages using the most current available key. 在翻转时间到期前，双方都可以接受以上一个会话密钥加密的传入消息。Both parties can accept incoming messages secured with the previous session key until the rollover time expires. 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均适用：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有客户端凭据类型。All client credential types for and . - 如果已启用[ \ 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90))，则为。If [\ element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90)) is enabled. - 如果未启用[ \ 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90))，则在上 为 = `true` 或 = `true` 。If [\ element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90)) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均不适用：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 对于 。For . - 对于 。For . - 如果未启用[ \ 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90))，则在 带有 = `true` 或且没有 属性设置为时 `true` 。If [\ element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms731375(v=vs.90)) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 `SessionKeyRolloverInterval` 值。This example shows how get the `SessionKeyRolloverInterval` value. summary.span: 获取或设置消息在由服务发送时的最长有效时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum duration of time that messages are valid when sent by the service.

summary.span: 如果客户端在此期间后收到服务的消息，该客户端将丢弃该消息。

span.span: If the client receives the service's message after this duration, it discards the message.

value.span: 消息在由服务发送时的最长有效时间。

span.span: The maximum duration of time that messages are valid when sent by the service.

value.span: 默认为 5 分钟。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.
